title: U.S. Life Expectancy Continues To Tick Upward
teaser: Robert Siegel talks with Elizabeth Arias, a statistician at the National Center for Health Statistics. A new study finds that for a child born that year, life expectancy is 78 years and 9.5 months.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
